# The Good Ship

> Strategy, technology & resilience for social purpose organisations.

The Good Ship is a consultancy founded by Tom Campbell Watson, based in North East England. We help charities, social enterprises, B Corps, and mission-driven organisations navigate uncertainty through strategy, technology, data, and open tools.

## Services

- AI & Technology Strategy: Helping organisations adopt AI and technology thoughtfully
- Data Strategy, Architecture & Design: Building data foundations that serve mission
- Organisational Resilience: Strengthening organisations to weather uncertainty
- Product & Team Development: Building capable teams and useful products
- Learning Partnerships & Coaching: Ongoing support and capability building
- Open Infrastructure: Building shared tools and platforms for the sector

## Tools

- Open Recommendations (openrecs.com): Analysis tool for social sector reports
- The List (the-list.uk): UK funding database
- Map My Patch (mapmypatch.co.uk): Neighbourhood mapping tool
- Questions for Action (questionsforaction.com): Prioritisation tool
- llmstxt.social: AI-readable documentation platform
- Flowlance (flowlance.io): Finance and project management for freelancers
- TechFreedom (techfreedom.eu): Tech sovereignty programme for social purpose organisations
